segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, and it looks like he's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he's stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sick watching him, hoping he doesn't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, but she doesn't seem to notice the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before and know what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water on the floor makes it even more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get the cookies and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a risky move, and I can't help but feel nervous watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's determination is impressive, but his balance is not.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm on the edge of my seat, hoping he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mix of excitement and danger, and it's hard to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt, but I also hope they don't get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
